answers.author: Robert Bruner
answers.text:
Personally, I dislike the term "core" services.  I prefer to think in terms of priorities.  We went through a prioritization process.  See attached.

author: Brandi Braun
text: We want to facilitate a a process to identify Core City Services.  Any suggestions in terms of processes and paramaters?
title: Determining Core Services
